Key Match Events: Sanoja hit a leadoff double in the second.
Sanoja pulled Johnson's two-strike changeup for an RBI single in the fourth.
Pre-Game Insights: Sanoja made his debut as a pinch-hitter on Saturday ahead of Sunday’s start.
Sanoja became the youngest Marlins position player to debut since teammate Jose Devers (21 years, 138 days) on April 24, 2021.
Post-Match Reflections: Sanoja expressed gratitude for the support from veterans in winter ball.
Sanoja felt the rush of emotions before running out to center field for Sunday’s start but quickly adapted to the game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sanoja’s performance inspired the team and his teammates celebrated his performance.
Sanoja’s debut included a fielder’s choice RBI in the seventh inning.
